user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and I need some ideas for food and desserts. Suggest some chicken dishes, desserts, and pizza that would be perfect for the party.

TaskList.description: Gather a list of popular chicken dishes suitable for a party setting.
Collect ideas for desserts that would complement the chicken dishes.
Research various types of pizzas that are crowd-pleasers for parties.
Compile all the gathered information into a cohesive menu for the birthday party.
